vsParam:
Ah~~ Ah~ Ah~ ♪
Mermaids' heart is clearer than the ocean~ ♪

To be honest,
Amaryllis... is not so good at singing.

Boo-hoo! Peppermint!
What did you just say?

Yeah! How is she not good at it?
What do you think, Cresson?

Hmm. You want my comment?
OK. Mmm.

I think this is a very unique way of singing.
Nothing's wrong with it...

Hmm. Really?
I think she is just tone-deaf...

Ah ah ah ah!? Sorry, Amaryllis!
This is Peppermint's fault! That stupid fairy!

Bah!! Hey, Sorel! Don't squeeze me!
My body is getting crushed!

Ha ha ha. It's alright.
My mermaid friends said the same thing.
Generally, mermaids are gifted in singing.

I'm just... a little bit below average.
A little bit.
I feel that your self-esteem is being watched...

Yes!! Anyway,
I don't care what others think.

The only thing that matters is how I enjoy it.
I love singing. Simple like that.

When you sing...
You look very happy and content, Amaryllis.

Yeah~ When I'm happy, singing makes me happier...
And when I'm sad, singing cheers me up...

My spirits would be boosted!
Singing is probably good for health, right?

Ah. It's possible.
My grandpa loves singing, so he lives a very long life...

... I have an idea!
Let's all start singing!

Yeah. Of course! We sing when we want to sing!
This is the best way to "nourish our minds"!

I see...
Let me show you my singing!

Ah. Then I'll start singing too!
I must be more confident than Amaryllis!

Ah. You guys are all in high spirits! So let me hear it!
I'll start...!
